configurationParameter.name: CustomConfigFile
configurationParameter.description: Use a user-defined config file. Warning: with this option it is possible to override some YaTeA options which are hard-coded in the AE, but the AE may fail if such options are not compatible with the way the output is read buy this AE.

configurationParameter.name: StrictMatchType
configurationParameter.description:
Must be "loose", "strict" or empty.
From YaTeA help about "match-type" option:
affects the matching of testified terms in the corpus; with "loose", testified terms match either inflected or lemmatized forms of each word; with "strict", testified terms match the combination of inflected form and PoS tag of each word"; by default, testified terms match inflected forms of words.

configurationParameter.name: MonolexicalAll
configurationParameter.description:
From YaTeA help:
all the occurrences of monolexical phrases are considered as term candidate occurrences

configurationParameter.name: MonolexicalIncluded
configurationParameter.description:
From YaTeA help:
occurrences of monolexical term candidates that appear in complex term candidates are also considered as term candidate occurrences

configurationParameter.name: Termino
configurationParameter.description:
From YaTeA help:
(optional) name of a file containing testified terms (in the TreeTagger format)

configurationParameter.name: CustomLinguisticDataDir
configurationParameter.description: (optional) Path to directory containing a subdirectory called EN or FR (language dependent) which contains linguistic data files (YaTeA format)

configurationParameter.name: DeleteTempFilesAfterProcess
configurationParameter.description: If false, the YaTeA output file(s) are not deleted.

configurationParameter.name: TagOccurrencesOnly
configurationParameter.description: To annotate only the occurrences, i.e. not to add a Term annotation containing the list of occurrences for each term.

configurationParameter.name: YateaTermDetails
configurationParameter.description: To add YaTeA details about each term: a YateaTermOccurrence will be used instead of a simple TermOccurrence, and if TagOccurrencesOnly is false a YateaTerm will be used instead of a simple Term.

configurationParameter.name: RunIdValue
configurationParameter.description: Custom value that will be written in the "runId" feature of all output annotations

configurationParameter.name: SentenceFilter
configurationParameter.description: A list of conditions that the annotations features must satisfy to be taken into account. It must have the form: <attr>=<value> for example "runId=myRunIdValue", "componentId=myComponentIdValue"

configurationParameter.name: TokenFilter
configurationParameter.description: A list of conditions that the annotations features must satisfy to be taken into account. It must have the form: <attr>=<value> for example "runId=myRunIdValue", "componentId=myComponentIdValue"

configurationParameter.name: PartOfSpeechFilter
configurationParameter.description: A list of conditions that the annotations features must satisfy to be taken into account. It must have the form: <attr>=<value> for example "runId=myRunIdValue", "componentId=myComponentIdValue"

configurationParameter.name: LemmaFilter
configurationParameter.description: A list of conditions that the annotations features must satisfy to be taken into account. It must have the form: <attr>=<value> for example "runId=myRunIdValue", "componentId=myComponentIdValue"
